articles.title: Model 3 leads global EV market, while Model Y beats ID.3 - The Driven
articles.description: The Tesla Model 3 is still clear lead in the global plug-in electric vehicle market, while Tesla's Model Y and fellow 2020 newcomer Volkswagen ID.3 jostle for a place in the top three.
articles.content:
The Tesla Model 3 is still the clear leader in the global plug-in electric vehicle market, but Tesla’s Model Y and fellow 2020 newcomer Volkswagen ID.3 are both showing enormous promise.
